title: Public transport for Travis Scott – Circus Maximus Tour: Tuesday 22 and Wednesday 23 October 2024
articleContent:
We're running extra services to get you to and from Travis Scott - Circus Maximus World Tour at Marvel Stadium on Tuesday 22 and Wednesday 23 October.

Gates open at 5pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Tuesday 22 October and Wednesday 23 October

 Metropolitan train

Leaving Marvel Stadium via Southern Cross

Trains leave Southern Cross after the concert ends:

  • Mernda at 11:22pm, 11:41pm and 11:52pm, Platform 9
  • Heidelberg at 11:28pm, 11:37pm and 11:57pm, Platform 9
  • Glen Waverley at 11:15pm, 11:26pm and 11:47pm, Platform 10
  • Werribee at 11:23pm and 11:44pm, Platform 14
  • Sunbury at 11:20pm, Platform 14
  • Watergardens at 11:20pm, Platform 14
  • Craigieburn at 11:16pm and 11:37pm, Platform 14
  • Upfield at 11:28pm, Platform 14
  • Dandenong at 11:17pm and 11:32pm, Platform 12
  • Frankston at 11:20pm and 11:40pm, Platform 13
  • Sandringham at 11:15pm and 11:44pm, Platform 13

 Regional train

To Southern Cross Station

Extra services

  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 5:19pm
  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 5:46pm
  • Melton (Ballarat) to Southern Cross leaving 5:44pm

Extra capacity

  • Wendouree (Ballarat) to Southern Cross leaving 2:38pm
  • South Geelong (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 2:50pm
  • South Geelong (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 2:05pm

From Southern Cross Station

Extra services

  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:41pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) 12:00am
  • Southern Cross to Ballarat (Ballarat) leaving 11:35pm
  • Southern Cross to Bacchus Marsh (Ballarat) leaving 11:45pm
  • Additional Coach: Southern Cross to Seymour leaving 11:30pm

Extra capacity

  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving 11:52pm
  • Southern Cross to Bendigo (Bendigo) leaving 11:57pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:30pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 12:15am

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Extra Route 30a and Route 86a trams run between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via La Trobe Street.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium:

Catch any of the following buses close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 232 (Altona North to City)
  • Route 235 (Fishermans Bend to City)
  • Route 302 (Box Hill to City)
  • Route 304 (Doncaster SC to City)
  • Route 905 (The Pines SC to City)
  • Route 906 (Warrandyte to City)
  • Route 907 (Mitcham to City)

articleDescription: We're running extra services to and from Listen Out on Friday 27 September.
